org.mini2Dx.core.screen.transition

Class FadeOutTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.screen.transition.FadeOutTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition

    public class FadeOutTransition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transition
    Implements a fade out transition NOTE: Based on Slick implementation by Kevin Glass
